attributes.action: Make all fireworks silent from 2025 onwards
attributes.additional_details:
As a society of Animal Lovers why do we put our pets through this every year? This can go on for two or more nights not just bonfire night .. even on the run up to New Years Eve, people are setting off fireworks until the early hours.
Fireworks should be made Silent and only be sold as ‘silent in shops ‘ .
attributes.background: Please can all Fireworks be made silent, as every year my pets are petrified of all the noises and my cat who is a nervous cat as it is is currently hiding behind my couch as all he can hear is banging.  Fireworks should be made silent from 2025 onwards.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:


Make it illegal to sell, buy and use fireworks other than silent ones - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223
